entities.description: Continued methamphetamine use despite it causing arguments with family or friends.
Increased chance of getting hurt when using methamphetamine.
Feeling blue or down after using less or stopping methamphetamine.
Feeling tired or exhausted as a withdrawal symptom after using less or stopping methamphetamine.

relationships.description: Methamphetamine use despite causing arguments with family or friends.
Using methamphetamine increases the chance of getting hurt.
Using less or stopping methamphetamine can cause feelings of being blue or down.
Using less or stopping methamphetamine can cause feelings of tiredness or exhaustion as withdrawal symptoms.
